articles.title: Perplexity is reportedly looking to fundraise at an $8B valuation - TechCrunch
articles.description: AI search engine Perplexity is in fundraising talks and hopes to raise around $500 million at an $8 billion valuation, according to the Wall Street
articles.content:
AI search engine Perplexity is in fundraising talks and hopes to raise around $500 million at an $8 billion valuation, according to the Wall Street Journal.
